half_double_crochet down edge of fin picking up loops from side edge of work break off yarn pull through and leave end long for sewing up © akabekobotan 2016 c eyes make 2 eye use white yarn and scrap yarn to mark start of round start with 6-double_crochet magic_ring working in the round round 1 2 double_crochet in same st until end of round round 2 * double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same st ** repeat * to ** to end of round round 3 * 2 double_crochet in same st 2 single_crochet ** repeat * to ** to end of round round 4 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same st * 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same st ** repeat * to ** to end of round 2 single_crochet 2 slip_stitch break off yarn and use invisible fasten_off pupil make 6-double_crochet magic_ring use invisible fasten_off leave end of yarn long and sew to middle of eye d tail fin start with white yarn and scrap yarn to mark start of round start with 6-double_crochet magic_ring working in the round round 1 2 double_crochet in same st until end of round round 2 * double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same st ** repeat * to ** to end of round round 3 * 2 double_crochet in same st 2 double_crochet ** repeat * to ** to end of round rounds 4-8 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same st * 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same st ** repeat * to ** to end of round 8 round 9 3 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet slip_stitch into 1st st of row break off yarn and pull through leaving end of yarn long for sewing edges together fold in half from last st use long end of yarn to sew edges together block to shape if desired © akabekobotan 2016 e barbels make 2 using a knitting bee/knitting nancy make a cord approximately 25cm
